html:
** Electric vehicle maker Rivian Automotive Inc RIVN.O, backed by both Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O and Ford Motor Co F.N, launches one of this year's most hotly anticipated IPOs

** RIVN looking to sell 135 mln shares in range of $57-$62; co could raise more than $9 bln if IPO prices at top end of range and full overallotment is exercised (Full Story)

** IPO scheduled to price Nov 9, and for shares to debut the following day, Weds, Nov 10, on the Nasdaq with symbol "RIVN", according to ECM sources familiar with the offering

** AMZN, T. Rowe Price Associates, Coatue Management, Franklin Templeton, and Capital Research among several firms acting as "cornerstone investors" and have indicated interest in buying up to $5 bln of the offering, per prospectus filing

** Morgan Stanley, Goldman, JP Morgan leading 22-firm underwriting group for the IPO


(Lance Tupper is a Reuters market analyst. The views expressed are his own)

(( lance.tupper.tr.com@reuters.net
lance.tupper@tr.com 1-332-219-1430) )
